briefTitle: Study for the Knowledge of Risk Factors Associated With Breast Cancer in Women
officialTitle: Observational Study to Understand the Risk Factors Associated With Breast Cancer in Women With a Recent Diagnosis at the Community of Madrid
conditions: Breast Neoplasm Female, Nutrition Related Cancer, Habits, Diet, Cancer, Breast
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Dietary habits of a group of women with pre and post-surgical breast cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Older women than 18 years old
* Newly diagnosed patients with a breast tumor (Phase I, II or III). Being in one of the following cases:

  1. Patient who has not yet received any treatment and the committee has decided that as a first treatment will receive chemo or radiotherapy.
  2. Patient who has just undergone surgery and is waiting to start adjuvant treatment with chemo or radiotherapy.
* Sign the informed consent.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with stage IV disease.
* Associated Eating Disorders.
* Patients with dementia, mental illness or decreased cognitive function.
* Pregnant or lactating women.
